Package lib.homies.framework.minigame

Interface MiniGame

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMiniGame
public interface MiniGame
A platform-agnostic interface representing a minigame. This interface defines the core contract for any minigame within the framework.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      UUID getId()
      Gets the unique ID of this minigame instance.
      Returns:
      The UUID of the minigame.

    • getLeader

      HomiesPlayer getLeader()
      Gets the leader of the minigame.
      Returns:
      The HomiesPlayer who is the leader.

    • getMembers

      Set<HomiesPlayer> getMembers()
      Gets an unmodifiable set of all players currently in the minigame.
      Returns:
      A Set of HomiesPlayers.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Gets the name of the minigame.
      Returns:
      The name of the minigame.

    • start

      void start()
      Starts the minigame. This method should transition the game state and initiate game logic.

    • stop

      void stop()
      Stops the minigame. This method should transition the game state and clean up game resources.

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(HomiesPlayer player)
      Adds a player to the minigame.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to add.

    • removePlayer

      void removePlayer(HomiesPlayer player)
      Removes a player from the minigame.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to remove.

    • getState

      MiniGameState getState()
      Gets the current state of the minigame.
      Returns:
      The current MiniGameState.
